entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
